name: sfpwowerscript-validateapextestcoverage-task
friendlyName: Validates Apex Test Coverage in an Org
description: Validates  apex test coverage in the org, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com
instanceNameFormat: Validate  Apex Tests  Coverage for  $(test_coverage) % in $(target_org)

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the current working directory containing  config file for the scratch org

inputs.name: test_coverage
inputs.label: Tests coverage % to be validated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The percentage of test coverage for apex clasess, that should be as per the last test run status
